nodes.text: Brun was a Human male prisoner who worked as the cargo crew boss of the night shift at the Slashtown Prison Colony guard compound on Despayre.

Brun had been incarcerated for several crimes, including piracy, specializing in stripping and then reselling electronics from captured ships. After having been on Despayre for many years, he managed to work his way up into a position of trust with the dirtside guards. Using his position, Brun assisted a fellow prisoner, Celot Ratua Dil, escape Despayre.
